chapter.title: Pandora Servers
chapter.para: In Pandora 1.2 there are different type of servers, Network Server, Data Server or SNMP Server.
It is possible to manage the Pandora Servers from the "Manage Servers" option of the Administration menu.
The following fields are displayed in the Managed Servers page:

listitem.para: Status: Status of the server. Green OK and Red FAIL.
IP address: IP of the Server.
Master: Marked when the server is Master and not marked when the master is backup.
Started at: Date when the Server started.
Updated at: The date of the last update.
Action: Icons to modify server properties or to delete a server (only in Administration menu).

chapter.para: From "Manage Servers", Administration menu you can configure and manage servers.
It is possible delete a server using the icon
It is possible to change the server properties using the icon
In a Server it is possible to modify: Name, IP Address and Description.
